message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I was really hoping to get closer to the original price I had in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value you'll get from this unique product.
